pics.caption: VERY CLEAN, STARTER HOME IN WELL ESTABLISHED NEIGHBORHOOD~NEW HVAC UNIT (4 MOS)~NEW ENERGY EFFICIENT TILT IN WINDOWS~ NEW WATER HEATER~NEW STOVE~NEW OUTSIDE ELECTRICAL W/NEW METER~FRESH PAINT~UPDATED BATH W/TILE & PEDESTAL~1/2 ACRE FENCED YARD!
NOTICE THE BEAUTIFUL HARDWOOD FLOORS, AND THE STAINED GLASS IN THE FRONT DOOR!
UPDATED KITCHEN WITH NICE CABINETS AND NEW STOVE!
THE DINING AREA HAS A BIG PICTURE WIINDOW AND A PASS THRU TO THE KITCHEN
EACH OF THE BEDROOMS HAS NEW CARPETING (VERY NICE HARDWOODS UNDERNEATH) AND CEILING FANS
THE BATHROOM HAS A NEW PEDESTAL SINK, NEW TILE FLOORING AND A LARGE LINEN CLOSET!
THE DEN HAS A SEPARATE ENTRANCE AND COULD EASILY BE CONVERTED TO A MASTER SUITE. THE SELLER USED THE ATTACHED 11 X 7 LAUNDRY ROOM AS A WALK-IN CLOSET!
WHAT A GREAT BACKYARD FOR THE KIDS/PETS! FULLY FENCED WITH A CARPORT AND A STORAGE SHED
